summary: TAKATA RECALL.  FOR MONTHS I HAVE BEEN CALLING MY LOCAL CHEVROLET DEALER (BEST CHEVROLET OF EASLEY SC) AND CHEVROLET DIRECTLY.  NOBODY CAN SCHEDULE A RECALL CORRECTIVE MEASURE.  I'VE HAD 2 BMWS, A DODGE AND A HONDA AFFECTED BY THE TAKATA CAMPAIGN REPAIRED. (YES I OWN MANY CARS). WHY CAN'T GM PERFORM.  PENALIZE THEM.  HEAVILY.
